library(igraph)

human ¹0

graphs <- list()
graphs[[1]] <- graph.formula( 30-34, 19-38, 20-23, 1-26, 16-20, 16-21, 2-25, 11-18, 16-19, 22-34, 37-38, 16-17, 15-23, 12-25, 11-25, 16-22, 11-23, 6-19, 32-36, 23-38, 20-25, 6-33, 23-33, 6-37, 8-34, 15-37, 21-23, 7-20, 28-33, 8-28, 4-23, 16-27, 13-25, 6-7, 21-25, 10-35, 2-18, 16-30, 12-33, 12-22, 15-30, 3-30, 24-36, 3-27, 3-22, 36-39, 5-9, 14-34, 13-19, 4-25, 18-32, 6-9, 12-19, 2-9, 16-35, 17-20, 7-17, 19-31, 19-29, 0-39, 14-38, 14-35, 11-29, 7-25, 28-36, 2-24, 3-7, 9-34, 32-33, 5-27, 4-19, 21-24, 23-34, 22-25, 15-19, 13-24, 5-8, 7-23, 4-9, 6-8, 10-38, 10-34, 11-15, 10-37, 2-8, 14-29, 15-22, 30-37, 19-24, 12-14, 14-31, 3-15, 9-28, 19-34, 8-36, 3-11, 11-19, 16-37, 32-35, 8-9, 24-39, 21-30, 3-28, 4-31, 0-24, 0-28, 13-17, 5-29, 5-14, 26-39, 14-25, 1-9, 21-37, 7-19, 4-7, 28-39, 6-24, 7-9, 5-35, 26-35, 6-15, 26-29, 7-30, 12-15, 32-39, 31-35, 16-34, 8-10, 6-35, 26-31, 15-17, 15-24, 28-29, 2-28, 3-19, 27-33, 3-23, 5-15, 28-35, 17-31, 18-19, 7-33, 29-35, 22-37, 27-37, 20-21, 8-19, 35-36, 12-28, 9-39, 7-26, 9-18, 5-31, 18-23, 22-26, 22-27, 0-35, 21-28, 14-37, 3-14, 17-24, 7-27, 17-29, 22-33, 15-28, 32-38, 19-23, 13-28, 11-28, 20-28, 34-38, 4-28, 7-37, 15-35, 8-18, 14-18, 25-32, 28-31, 16-38, 17-35, 6-31, 15-31, 26-30, 2-21, 24-35, 12-21, 26-27, 2-11, 26-33, 4-13, 2-4, 27-30, 4-20, 2-13, 10-14, 16-32, 13-21, 11-20, 4-12, 3-26, 12-13, 5-6, 13-20, 6-28, 33-37, 15-29, 10-26, 16-25, 7-22, 26-37, 5-28, 11-12, 2-20, 2-12, 4-21, 12-20, 11-13, 4-11, 18-26, 3-18, 11-21, 14-26)
graphs[[1]] <- simplify(graphs[[1]])

lay <- lapply(graphs, layout.fruchterman.reingold, niter=3000)

par(mai=c(0,0,0,0))
layout(matrix(1:1, nr=1, byrow=TRUE))
layout.show(1)
for (i in seq(along=graphs)) {
  plot(graphs[[i]], layout=lay[[i]],
       vertex.label=NA, vertex.size=3, edge.color="black",
       vertex.color="red")
}

human ¹3

graphs <- list()
graphs[[1]] <- graph.formula( 19-23, 5-19, 14-18, 6-23, 0-29, 14-16, 3-35, 23-26, 19-20, 19-33, 16-24, 12-17, 8-23, 17-38, 27-33, 18-33, 2-11, 0-5, 19-21, 15-23, 7-22, 16-17, 14-38, 1-28, 4-31, 28-29, 14-31, 18-38, 9-26, 4-34, 2-6, 23-35, 9-33, 0-26, 10-36, 0-25, 26-28, 14-36, 13-36, 31-36, 0-16, 9-22, 8-26, 4-26, 0-8, 0-37, 1-38, 19-25, 12-35, 6-35, 22-26, 27-35, 14-35, 0-30, 6-27, 8-15, 10-34, 10-35, 3-39, 4-8, 23-36, 9-30, 35-37, 18-39, 8-10, 11-28, 18-23, 2-35, 29-35, 24-26, 24-28, 8-11, 0-33, 20-35, 3-25, 17-24, 26-33, 26-39, 11-14, 16-19, 12-20, 0-34, 28-39, 7-26, 4-33, 0-22, 24-39, 5-9, 0-4, 6-12, 2-20, 16-34, 17-26, 4-22, 5-27, 8-33, 9-13, 23-39, 9-24, 19-34, 9-36, 26-30, 9-31, 17-39, 8-22, 13-26, 5-35, 8-39, 22-33, 0-35, 10-23, 7-31, 7-8, 16-18, 18-25, 9-17, 21-35, 2-9, 7-36, 2-29, 12-27, 12-29, 8-30, 9-35, 37-39, 3-34, 20-29, 3-16, 7-13, 15-39, 26-36, 9-28, 22-30, 11-39, 14-21, 5-14, 15-26, 17-28, 0-23, 6-9, 4-35, 9-15, 0-39, 14-39, 9-21, 10-39, 8-14, 8-36, 26-31, 23-37, 9-14, 18-34, 22-35, 11-26, 21-26, 2-27, 8-12, 30-35, 6-39, 36-39, 26-35, 30-33, 20-27, 2-39, 12-39, 8-29, 5-26, 8-27, 9-20, 4-39, 9-27, 8-20, 9-29, 8-13, 9-11, 8-31, 6-8, 27-39, 9-12, 29-39, 33-35, 8-35, 22-39, 30-39, 1-32, 20-39, 4-36, 20-26, 35-36, 31-35, 6-14, 5-39, 0-10, 33-39, 35-39, 33-36, 13-35, 2-8, 14-20, 2-14, 21-39, 12-14, 15-28, 3-19, 5-8, 14-27, 12-26, 26-29, 26-27, 2-26, 30-36, 8-21, 3-18, 14-29, 7-35, 13-31, 7-39, 13-39, 6-26, 14-26, 2-12, 18-19, 31-39, 22-36, 27-29)
graphs[[1]] <- simplify(graphs[[1]])

lay <- lapply(graphs, layout.fruchterman.reingold, niter=3000)

par(mai=c(0,0,0,0))
layout(matrix(1:1, nr=1, byrow=TRUE))
layout.show(1)
for (i in seq(along=graphs)) {
  plot(graphs[[i]], layout=lay[[i]],
       vertex.label=NA, vertex.size=3, edge.color="black",
       vertex.color="red")
}

human ¹7

graphs <- list()
graphs[[1]] <- graph.formula( 16-27, 12-34, 14-38, 10-27, 29-34, 24-36, 14-23, 20-34, 2-34, 4-25, 5-34, 16-21, 8-34, 0-5, 6-34, 4-23, 21-23, 2-22, 35-38, 30-38, 24-28, 22-25, 11-23, 3-16, 20-27, 3-11, 8-26, 4-29, 29-33, 25-26, 23-27, 6-9, 4-12, 10-34, 23-25, 32-35, 0-8, 32-39, 14-19, 5-33, 23-37, 0-14, 19-22, 3-18, 1-26, 8-36, 6-31, 18-34, 11-29, 20-33, 19-21, 9-34, 12-13, 2-33, 10-30, 7-9, 19-27, 29-37, 25-36, 17-33, 19-34, 23-30, 10-19, 21-22, 12-18, 1-36, 26-36, 17-27, 1-9, 7-15, 20-37, 27-30, 10-11, 1-14, 3-34, 19-35, 19-30, 8-28, 9-12, 0-26, 15-39, 9-14, 12-14, 17-18, 31-39, 10-35, 10-23, 18-19, 5-8, 5-27, 35-36, 12-37, 2-8, 0-28, 28-39, 1-31, 2-21, 18-20, 7-28, 22-28, 25-31, 18-23, 17-39, 6-21, 9-33, 5-18, 8-31, 1-28, 25-28, 5-15, 9-29, 6-17, 9-20, 18-29, 1-24, 11-30, 6-8, 15-20, 34-36, 7-30, 1-12, 17-37, 12-39, 9-15, 29-39, 20-39, 4-17, 13-21, 1-33, 5-39, 1-2, 9-13, 6-39, 2-29, 2-39, 13-17, 9-17, 35-39, 1-7, 7-17, 25-33, 1-29, 1-35, 10-33, 1-20, 1-5, 2-15, 18-35, 25-29, 28-31, 0-15, 15-26, 4-8, 0-31, 6-33, 24-31, 23-26, 7-8, 9-27, 13-39, 9-35, 6-18, 6-7, 1-13, 2-27, 9-21, 11-39, 2-11, 1-27, 9-22, 25-35, 1-22, 4-39, 8-12, 37-39, 21-39, 1-4, 1-6, 1-21, 27-39, 33-39, 15-29, 1-15, 1-23, 7-39, 25-27, 14-35, 9-37, 30-35, 2-5, 1-37, 5-14, 26-39, 4-13, 9-11, 2-20, 17-26, 22-39, 8-19, 1-17, 8-29, 8-15, 6-20, 12-26, 1-11, 25-37, 8-20, 1-30, 18-39, 14-39, 5-6, 30-39, 2-14, 13-18, 1-19, 1-10, 14-15, 35-37, 2-18, 9-30, 20-26, 5-26, 13-33, 22-35, 8-17, 25-30, 13-37, 8-33, 34-35, 7-13, 26-31, 22-27, 14-28, 4-18, 1-18, 10-39, 14-29, 27-28, 1-3, 11-28, 14-20, 2-37, 2-26, 6-27, 26-28, 6-37, 8-14, 27-35, 6-26, 2-4, 6-14, 21-28, 8-35, 7-35, 8-13, 4-6, 6-13, 28-37, 1-38, 9-10, 34-37, 15-28, 13-26, 18-37, 7-22, 13-14, 2-17, 10-18, 9-18, 8-21, 33-35, 30-33, 8-27, 3-9, 19-23, 21-35, 14-17, 4-26, 17-31, 2-13, 18-28, 21-26, 8-37, 8-23, 4-28, 4-35, 12-15, 8-22, 11-26, 11-35, 7-26, 8-11, 8-39, 4-14, 11-22, 6-29, 6-12, 11-13, 5-20, 26-29, 13-28, 18-21, 1-32, 22-26, 2-28, 5-17, 13-27, 7-14, 9-23, 22-37, 11-18, 4-7, 13-35, 0-35, 4-33, 26-35, 24-35, 3-19, 11-14, 14-26, 17-20, 21-33, 4-37, 3-39, 1-16, 8-30, 18-27, 18-26, 2-35, 17-29, 7-21, 5-12, 14-27, 7-18, 23-39, 6-35, 26-33, 27-33, 3-26, 14-21, 8-18, 12-29, 29-35, 5-35, 26-27, 17-28, 20-35, 12-35, 3-23, 5-29, 8-10, 7-27, 11-33, 6-28, 19-39, 10-26, 26-37, 7-33, 12-20, 21-37, 9-19, 34-38, 10-14, 14-33, 22-33, 11-21, 28-35, 18-30, 12-28, 25-34, 4-11, 14-37, 21-27, 25-32, 33-37, 0-24, 9-39, 16-25, 14-30, 15-35, 18-33, 18-22, 16-32, 27-37, 4-27, 14-22, 16-34, 17-35, 25-38, 26-30, 31-35, 20-29, 14-18, 16-38, 12-17, 15-31, 11-37, 20-28, 7-11, 7-37, 32-34, 2-6, 5-28, 32-38, 3-8, 11-27, 4-21, 28-29)
graphs[[1]] <- simplify(graphs[[1]])

lay <- lapply(graphs, layout.fruchterman.reingold, niter=3000)

par(mai=c(0,0,0,0))
layout(matrix(1:1, nr=1, byrow=TRUE))
layout.show(1)
for (i in seq(along=graphs)) {
  plot(graphs[[i]], layout=lay[[i]],
       vertex.label=NA, vertex.size=3, edge.color="black",
       vertex.color="red")
}


human ¹8

graphs <- list()
graphs[[1]] <- graph.formula( 9-31, 27-36, 9-37, 9-33, 5-26, 8-13, 19-37, 0-6, 1-35, 6-26, 26-36, 4-36, 9-29, 9-12, 2-29, 1-14, 23-39, 7-26, 8-21, 16-36, 19-34, 23-35, 25-31, 24-28, 31-33, 19-29, human ¹9

graphs <- list()
graphs[[1]] <- graph.formula( 1-15, 1-5, 5-16, 5-24, 11-20, 1-2, 1-11, 1-13, 19-39, 25-39, 21-37, 22-27, 1-4, 2-16, 16-33, 10-11, 1-30, 32-36, 1-29, 0-16, 6-25, 23-34, 22-36, 16-37, 1-20, 12-32, 0-25,   plot(graphs[[i]], layout=lay[[i]],
       vertex.label=NA, vertex.size=3, edge.color="black",
       vertex.color="red")
